title: Tempt Me Not
description: Through circumstances, Victoria West was an innocent compared to most women her age; and her soft feminimity was a magnet to Lucas Grey.He believed her to be a widow, and his sexy tender wooing frequently made Victoria blush, even while she laughed. But her family's surface appearance was deceptive, and when Lucas found out the truth he felt used - how could they go forward into marriage now?
author: Susan Napier
